overview: Brian and Charlie. Brian and Charlie were the best tag-team ever..." One day, the two are separated and start to live very different lives. The film is a powerful and lyrical portrayal of the lives of these two young men through a series of spoken monologues and images that are the common cry of their youth. The filmmaker's love of pro-wrestling, science fiction and rock music becomes a powerful theory of life that challenges the viewer.
title: BRYAN GO GO
